name: run_id
description: Unique identifier (UUID) for this scheduled pipeline run. Used to track scheduled executions and their lifecycle.

name: customer_id
description: Customer/tenant identifier. Used for multi-tenancy isolation and filtering.

name: config_id
description: Pipeline configuration identifier. Links to the pipeline definition that should be executed.

name: state
description: Current state of the scheduled run. Valid values: SCHEDULED (future execution), PENDING (ready to run), RUNNING (executing), COMPLETED (finished successfully), FAILED (execution failed). Used for state machine transitions.

name: scheduled_time
description: UTC timestamp when this pipeline is scheduled to run. Used for determining which pipelines are due for execution.

name: created_at
description: UTC timestamp when this scheduled run was created. Used for auditing and age calculations.

name: updated_at
description: UTC timestamp of last state change. Used for tracking state transitions and detecting stuck pipelines.

name: pipeline_logging_id
description: Links to x_meta_pipeline_runs.pipeline_logging_id when execution starts. NULL until pipeline begins running. Used to correlate scheduled runs with actual execution logs.

name: retry_count
description: Number of retry attempts for this run. Incremented on each failure. Used for retry limit enforcement and backoff calculations.

name: error_message
description: Error message from most recent failure. NULL if run hasn't failed. Used for debugging and determining if error is retryable.

name: metadata
description: Flexible JSON field for storing additional execution metadata like execution_duration_seconds, retry_config, worker_info, etc. Provides extensibility without schema changes.
